directions: Place the garbanzo beans, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and red peppers in the bowl of a food processor. Add 2 tablespoons of the reserved juice from the garbanzo beans. Pulse until the mixture is smooth, scraping the sides and blade to mix completely. Cover, and refrigerate until ready to  use.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained, liquid reserved
1/2 cup bottled roasted red bell peppers
title: Awesome Red Pepper Hummus Dip
